price: 20. Dheh: Waxaan uun baryayaa (caabudi Allaah Keliya) Rabbigay, lana wadaajin maayo cidna cibaadada.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
